attributes.action: call a general election without delay, due to the present goverment and their MP's no longer representing the wishes & views of the majority of the electorate. As this goverment was elected by a minority of the total population of this great country, it is now time to give the country the chance to elect a goverment that represents the current values of the electorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
